isis.stitle: Body Builder Electrical Data Book for Models Built Starting March 1, 2007 - Hybrid Electric Vehicle - 13GSB - EATON 6SPD HYBRID WITHOUT ePTO CAPABILITY

svcproc.title: 13GSB - EATON 6SPD HYBRID WITHOUT ePTO CAPABILITY
svcproc.para: 13GSC - EATON 6SPD HYBRID WITHOUT ePTO CAPABILITY for a Hybrid Electric Vehicle, includes warning lights.
This feature provides two warning lamps (STOP HYBRID and CHECK HYBRID) in a switch pack.
*Software feature codes can be added through the Diamond Logic® Builder software.
Software feature codes that must be removed: None

figure.caption: Overview of Hybrid without ePTO Capability

step1.para: Verify that the STOP HYBRID and CHECK HYBRID lamps work by having key in run position and perform a bulb check. The lamps should be on for 8 seconds.
Simulate the light turning on with Diamond Logic Builder or Eaton Service Ranger service tools.
If the Service Disconnect switch is pushed in, the Check Hybrid light should be flashing to indicate the hybrid system is offline.

svcproc.para: This feature cannot be added aftermarket at the present time.
